price: 7. Y quienes busquen (tener relaciones íntimas con) otras mujeresserán unos transgresores.
arabic: فَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡعَادُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: famani ib'taghā warāa dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-ʿādūna
